select accom_service_number,cate_number,accom_name,avgpoint,rcnt,min(accom_price) minp,max(accom_price) maxp from( select accom_service_number,accom_service.cate_number,accom_name,nvl(avg(star_point),0) avgpoint,count(review_number) rcnt from accom_service left join review on accom_service_number=service_number group by accom_service_number,accom_service.cate_number,accom_name having accom_service_number in( select accom_service_number from accom_option left join accom_book on accom_option.accom_option_number = accom_book.accom_option_number
(not (accom_startdate < #{endDate} and accom_enddate > #{startDate}) or (accom_startdate is null and accom_enddate is null)) and accom_max_people>=#{count} )
and accom_service_number in( select accom_service_number from accom_service natural join accom_info where
facility like '%'||#{fitem}||'%'
)
and accom_service_number in( select accom_service_number from accom_service natural join accom_info where
conven like '%'||#{citem}||'%'
)
and accom_service_number in( select accom_service_number from accom_option left join accom_book on accom_option.accom_option_number = accom_book.accom_option_number where accom_price<=#{maxprice})
and accom_service.cate_number=#{category}
) natural join accom_option group by accom_service_number,cate_number,accom_name,avgpoint,rcnt
order by avgpoint desc
order by rcnt desc
order by minp
order by maxp desc

select min(accom_price) minp,max(accom_price) maxp from accom_option group by accom_service_number having accom_service_number in
#{item}
order by minp
order by maxp desc

select * from accom_option where accom_service_number=#{accomNum}
and accom_max_people>=#{count}
SELECT trunc(to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')) - trunc(to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')) howLong FROM DUAL
select * from image where cate_number in(2,3,4,5) and general_number=#{general_number}
